articles.author: Laura Paddison, Andrew Freedman
articles.title: The Eiffel Tower is closed to tourists due to searing heat. Here’s why it’s happening - CNN
articles.description: A marine heat wave in the Mediterranean is combining with a powerful heat dome to cause Europe to swelter under a brutal early summer heat wave.
articles.content:
A marine heat wave in the Mediterranean Sea is combining with a powerful heat dome to cause Europe to swelter under a brutal early summer heat wave.
Its a pattern thats popping up frequently as the … [+3537 chars]
